content:
AI Hackathon by AUEB # This past weekend I particated in the ai hackathon that was organized by AUEB. My team and I attempted to tackle the accessibility problem in today’s web navigation by creating a chatbot. The chatbot could summarize and explain web content in a way that could accommodate people with various disabilities (e.g vision issues, ADHD etc.) While not really groundbreaking, we believed it is crucial to solve these kind of issues so that everyone(at least the ones with access to internet) can benefit from advents in technology.
We didn’t win a prize but it was fun to connect with people from various industries!
title: AI Hackathon
